title: 097 - Who's The Greatest Sensei Of All-Time
description: On today's show, the boys discuss who they would choose as the greatest sensei of all-time, the news that Wedding Crashers 2 is in production/if any noteworthy movies are coming out anytime soon, they choose which between four core foods and which one they would choose to get rid of, the Booby Brotherz have a dynamite drop in and ask a few questions for the first time in a long time, plus they dive into a loaded Pod FOD which includes much more, and Nick has a fresh list of Friday Bangerz to help propel you into the greatest weekend ever. Keep sending in your submissions to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram and subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow for all things PMI. We appreciate you for listening, enjoy.
